name: Teddy Together
synopsis: Become best friends with a teddy bear brought to life in Teddy Together. Take care of a special teddy bear who can talk, walk and play games in a title that’s ideal for parents and children to play together. Who hasn’t dreamed of their favourite toy coming to life? Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
